Uses of Class
org.fluentjdbc.DbContextSyncBuilder

Packages that use DbContextSyncBuilder
Package
Description
org.fluentjdbc
Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

  • Uses of DbContextSyncBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

    Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DbContextSyncBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DbContextSyncBuilder<T>
    DbContextSyncBuilder.cacheExisting()
    Loads all rows from the database.
    DbContextSyncBuilder<T>
    DbContextSyncBuilder.deleteExtras()
    Deletes from the database rows that are not included in the in-memory dataset, using DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder
    DbContextSyncBuilder<T>
    DbContextSyncBuilder.field(String field, Function<T,Object> valueFunction)
    Specifies how a column in the database relates to a value extracted from an in-memory object.
    DbContextSyncBuilder<T>
    DbContextSyncBuilder.insertMissing()
    Inserts into the database rows that were included in the in-memory dataset, but that didn't have corresponding rows in the database, using DbContextBulkInsertBuilder
    <T> DbContextSyncBuilder<T>
    DbContextTable.sync(List<T> entities)
    Creates a DbContextSyncBuilder which allows you to synchronize the data in the table with an external source
    DbContextSyncBuilder<T>
    DbContextSyncBuilder.unique(String field, Function<T,Object> valueFunction)
    Specifies that the field is a unique constraint and can be used to look up rows in the database based on objects in memory. valueFunction is used to extract the value from the in-memory object.
    DbContextSyncBuilder<T>
    DbContextSyncBuilder.updateDiffering()
    Updates in the database rows that were different in the in-memory dataset from the database, using DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder
